Reviews.Title: “wonderful”
Reviews.Author: joe g
Reviews.Content: very good location. and very clean motel. The manager and employees were very helpfull and considerate. I would strongly recomend this motel for sure.The next time i visit branson i will stay at fall creek inn.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable & Very Affordable”
Reviews.Author: Dan B
Reviews.Content: Clean rooms, nice & comfortable beds, good hot water in the showers, attentive front desk, decent little continental breakfast and a very good rate. Far from the Ritz-Carlton but at the low price you pay we were just very pleased. The whole family, all six of us, had two very good nights of sleep while resting up for the next day's activities. Strong thumbs-up.

Reviews.Title: “stinky motel”
Reviews.Author: Clarissa H
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel/inn on 7/27 to 7/29 I WILL NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN AND DON'T RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE!!! The room was STINKY and MUSTY SMELLING and the RUG was DIRTY!!! We asked for a different room and the air took hours to get cold. We killed two spiders in the 1st room and they also said that we would have spiders because we were by the woods so thats what you have to expect. When asked about a refund they said they wouldn't give us one since we had already checked in and it was after 7pm. Even though they switched us rooms the room was basically like the previous one!!!!! STAY AWAY FROM THIS INN!!

Reviews.Title: “great service”
Reviews.Author: nichwhit
Reviews.Content: Nice little motel . Just what is needed in Branson. Good location off of mo-76. Air condition was not cooling in the room and reported it to the front desk . 5 minutes later new one installed . very helpful for directions and how to use the blue ,yellow and red routes.

Reviews.Title: “Barely Average”
Reviews.Author: GKS89
Reviews.Content: We just got back from Branson yesterday (Sunday, July15th). We stayed at this hotel with the truck club. I thought after reading all the reviews on this website that this place would be great! Well, was I surprised. They have no front help after 10pm, so if you need anything after that you are out of luck. The housekeeping leaves at 4pm, so if you need them after that, the front desk person has to take care of it. Because they are the only one there you wait forever to get what you need or you just dont get it. We had no blanket on our bed and when I went down to get one she couldn't find any. She did finally find me one and it had so many holes in it and smelled so bad like cigarette smoke that we didn't even use it. Our ice bucket had a crack in it, no big deal, just go get another one right? Well about 5 hours after I asked I had to go back to the front desk to finally get it and guess what another cracked ice bucket!! I gave up after that! I received a smoking room after I was told when I made the reservation that if would be nonsmoking. They advertise a "Deluxe Continental Breakfast" guess again!!! Breakfast was pretty bad and not deluxe! You have to pay extra if you want a microwave or fridge. I haven't been to a hotel in 10 years that doesn't already have that in the room. The beds are new, but very hard. The free wi-fi only worked 10% of the time. Bathrooms and vanity area need to be remodeled, no coffee maker, iron or blow dryer in room. I will say the room was clean. The A/C worked great!! The pool area is nice. The location is nice and the 2 restaurants have very good food. The staff was very friendly. The room was reasonable, but you do get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Great Room,,Great Price,,Great Location”
Reviews.Author: vance d
Reviews.Content: We spent 4 nights here on July 4th week and received wonderful service.Easy check in,with great front desk service.Rooms were very,very clean.Very well working A/C unit in the 100 degree weather we had that week.Beds were comfortable,Very clean bathrooms.Pool was clean and clear.Nice cook out area beside creek...We will stay here again on our return visit to Branson. Overall Rating---A +++++++++ Thanks -Vance & Susan Natchez,MS

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel right off the strip...”
Reviews.Author: sweetsinclaire
Reviews.Content: This charming motel keeps you away from the horrendous Branson strip traffic! Basic rooms were perfectly clean and beds were comfortable. A/c was off and room was quite warm and stuffy on arrival, which would have been uncomfortable if we had arrived at bedtime. Other than that, staff was friendly, creek view was pretty, pool was clean with lots of chairs and breakfast was plentiful. Five stars for it's class of hotel.... I give it four for basic amenities. Will return!

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: GeeKatz
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 days at Fall Creek Inn in Branson.We have stayed there on numerous occasions and have always received wonderful service.The rooms are nothing fancy but nice and clean,the cleaning staff always had our room supplied with towels and etc.I guess my only complaint would have to be the bathrooms need to be remodeled and replaced with chair ht. toliets and stall showers in most rooms. Older folks could care less about taking a bath at a hotel and it would be easier to get in and out of a shower with bad knees or lower back problems.

Reviews.Title: “average”
Reviews.Author: jamie r
Reviews.Content: No coffee pot in the room, electric plug in next to sink didn't work, lights are dim in the bathroom which makes for a dark shower, and our feet were black from walking barefoot in our room. That being said, we are on our first night here and those inconveniences have not been enough to motivate us into going through the trouble of changing hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks”
Reviews.Author: Barbara B
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the clean rooms and swimming areas. We had a great time . The staff were awesome and very easy to get along with.

Reviews.Title: “clean and nice service”
Reviews.Author: Sherry F
Reviews.Content: I loved this place, it was so nice we had a big group for baseball. The pool was nice and the creek was a big hit for the boys. There was two restaurants next to us the bbq was great. Very highly recommend this hotel, and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and Clean”
Reviews.Author: Jim D
Reviews.Content: Experience the quiet and cleanliness of this establishment. Located on the outskirts of Branson with two good restaurants on each side of hotel. Good prices and glad we found a hotel that takes pets. Recommend it very highly

Reviews.Title: “comfortable room”
Reviews.Author: Shirley D
Reviews.Content: had all the basics we needed. breakfast is minimal, which is okay with us because we are not big breakfast eaters... beds were extremely comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff & Great location”
Reviews.Author: JonandLacy F
Reviews.Content: Very friendly and helpful staff. Nice quite location. Ended up having to leave a day early staff was very understanding and refunded the extra day. Would stay again. Beds are very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Our Favorite Place to Stay in Branson.”
Reviews.Author: Helen G
Reviews.Content: We stay at Fall Creek every time we come to Branson. Our room is always ready for us. The staff is very helpful day and night. If we forget something, they will get it for us. It's a very friendly place for families. There is a creek out back with picnic tables and grills. They have a nice pool area with plenty places to sunbathe and swim. The location is perfect for getting to shows and restaurants without getting in the strip's traffic. The Routes are easy to get to from Fall Creek. The parking area is well lighted and safe. Walking to get ice and snacks or sodas day or night is safe. Try this place. You won't be disappointed. Good clean rooms at a great price.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't Stany Anywhere Else!"”
Reviews.Author: Lori S
Reviews.Content: Very friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are nice and fridge and microwave were added at minimal cost. Lovely area to relax or picnic next to a creek in back...a real respite from the hustle bustle of the rest of Branson. We wouldn't stay anywhere else in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Quite and relaxing..”
Reviews.Author: jean p
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent our annivesary night here, and we stayed in a suite. It had a living room with separate bedroom and bath. Everything was very clean. There is a creek running behind the property with picnic tables and grill, it is so pretty and relaxing. There is a pool in the back as well, but it wasn't open yet. I would definitely stay again.. It is away from all the traffic, and is easy to go to shows and attractions, and there is a restaurant within walking distance..

Reviews.Title: “we will be back”
Reviews.Author: Bullfrog4d
Reviews.Content: We have driven by this place several times to stay at timesheet or the welk. This time was budget and couldn't afford 2 rooms at welk. We decided the family suite....excellent choice...only problem was the room was frigid when we got there but the heat was off. It warmed up quick however....could use a heater towards the back end also but great value.

Reviews.Title: “great place!”
Reviews.Author: Kyle D
Reviews.Content: me and some friends stayed there over the weekend on our trip to Branson. the staff was very friendly and helpful, the rooms were extremely clean, even the smoking rooms. the restaurant next door was amazing as well, it's within walking distance. there is a very cute creek in the back of the hotel, it's very peaceful and cute. you can also play horseshoes! the front desk lady was awesome, she was very friendly and helped us with all of our questions. had a great experience at this hotel. definitely would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “This would not be my choice”
Reviews.Author: Steven T
Reviews.Content: First, let me say. My wife and I were planning a trip to Branson. We ran across an offer from Summer Winds Resort( a time share) at the Texas State fair. The deal was "we will put you up at one of the nicer places, treat you to a good time(for $180/3 nights) for a chance to show you some time shares. This is at best, a 2 start motel, updated, but not modernized. The water peasure dropped, next to nothing twice while taking a shower for at least a minute. room are small. 3 floors, no elevator, all ouside rooms. If the trip was not arranged for me, I would have looked for a better place. We cut our stay there short and left after 2 nights. We were on a vacation, and coming back to this motel was frankly ruining it. ON THE PLUS SIDE. the rooms were spotlessly clean, the staff was courtious and desevre to be working at a nicer motel. I would say this is a good place to stay passing thru one night to your final destination, or if you are a working man that has stayed at worse places like I did when I worked in the field many years ago.

Reviews.Title: “Fall Creek Inn in Branson, Mo”
Reviews.Author: Chris B
Reviews.Content: The motel room was alittle small, but very clean. The motel called to make sure we were still coming, because we were running late (cleaning or deceased dad's home), which we thought was very nice! We we arrived Felica was so friendly and helpful. She recommended Dana's BBQ right next store for burgers. The burgers were fantastic. We came down for the continental breakfast and Felica was there again to greet us the next morning. Better hang on to her - very polite and always smiling, great person to wake up to in the am, when you are still tired!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Place To Stay In Branson”
Reviews.Author: Randy K
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed at the Fall Creek Inn three times over the last couple of years. The rooms are clean and the prices are reasonable. The staff is friendly. The breakfast is good for the amount of money you have to pay for your room. If you are trying to visit Branson on a modest budget this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “great price”
Reviews.Author: 9mmjames
Reviews.Content: great price. it is not the cleanest. but is clean. service is great. my husband and i stay there everytime we are in branson missouri we do love it

Reviews.Title: “There are Pro's and there are Con's”
Reviews.Author: ousoonergirl1
Reviews.Content: I have been traveling to Branson since I was a kid. My family and I now travel there 3-4 times a year. I have stayed in many places over the last 30+ years. This is definitely not the worse place I've ever stayed. Pro's: * Rooms are clean * Most of the Staff is friendly..except the lady that checked us in. She acted like she didn't want to be there. * I read a post from someone that said their electronics were stolen while staying here...I left my laptop in the room both days while we were gone to Silver Dollar City and nothing was ever taken. Not sure what the problem was there. * Nice outdoor pool * Bar-B-Que/Picnic area where you can cook out * Off the Strip, but there are two restaurants next door. * Reasonable rates, and they offer discounts for returning customers and if you opt to take the 2nd or 3rd floor. (Not too many places offer that) Our average cost was $55.00 night/on 3rd Floor Con's: * Breakfast is OK...nothing fancy. * Hot Water is an issue. After one child took their shower, there was no hot water left for the next person. * This is a BASIC room...NO shampoo, lotions, single user coffee pot, iron, ironing board, etc. However, they do have the items available upon request. (not a big deal but I just hate having to ask for every little thing). * Parking can be an issue in the evening because many customers from the restaurant next door take the parking spots of the hotel guests. All-in-all...I would probably stay here again if I was going on a quick weekend get-a-way and didn't want to spend a lot for a room.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding!”
Reviews.Author: ChadG1
Reviews.Content: All personnel went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable!

Reviews.Title: “Probably wouldn't stay again”
Reviews.Author: Tweedybirdcat S
Reviews.Content: Nice staff, clean room, BUT. Our air went out the second night and it was SO hot. We called the office several times and nobody answered. The next day we told them and they said their office was closed then. No one was working the office in the middle of the night. The breakfast was okay, nothing really to choose from. Saw a big black spider on the floor of the office when we went in to complain. Bath did not come with shampoo or conditioner. Wifi did not work.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and clean rooms.”
Reviews.Author: Adobs
Reviews.Content: I had a great stay! The staff was terrific, very helpful with show tickets, directions, and advice! Rooms were simple and clean. Great stay, I will use them again.

Reviews.Title: “We will always stay at the Fall Creek Inn...Loved it!!”
Reviews.Author: hurban
Reviews.Content: We were so impressed with our stay at the Fall Creek Inn.Tourist attractions are within minutes of the hotel, and the staff gives great directions for taking the best routes to get there. Management and hotel staff are so kind and accommadating. Rooms were comfortable, spacious and spotless. The whole family enjoyed the crystal clear outdoor pool. We can't wait to take the family back very soon!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay. peace and quiet and not far from the strip or the lake”
Reviews.Author: Jurban74
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last weekend with the family and it was incredrible...great hospitality....great location it was quiet..... didnt have the noise of the strip but was still close to it........the kids absolutely loved the pool ..we swam there every night........i highly recommend Location was great in between Table Rock Lake and the Strip....and nice and clean pool....rooms were great.........will stay everytime im in a 50 mile radius of that area......

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Clean, and Quiet,”
Reviews.Author: mstrace
Reviews.Content: I found this to be a very lovely place, very quiet, and clean. The GPS I was using gave me directions to a place in Hollister, way off target. I tracked down the number to the Inn, and called them. They were very nice to stay on the phone with me until I was in surroundings familiar to them and gave me directions from there. I drove right to it! The room was very clean, peaceful, and quiet. Both my pup and I felt very safe, and comfortable. We got a great nights rest. The BBQ next door was awesome! The place is now my preference of places to stay in Branson, very hospitable!

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE, ITEMS STOLEN FROM OUR ROOM!”
Reviews.Author: SALBERS
Reviews.Content: During our stay we had several items stolen from our room while we were at Silver Dollar City. We were only gone 4 hours and when we got back, we realized my son's Nintendo DSi was missing along with 5 games that he had brought with him! After searching our room we alson realized that our portable DVD player and 4 DVDs were also stolen! The owner and manager were rude and unhelpfull. The housekeeper assigned to our room has worked for them for years, so of course she didn't take anything...how ridiculous! The door was shut and locked when we left, so only someone with a key could get into the room, do the math! Do not stay here unless you have a safe to lock up your valuables. When you are on a family vacation you should not have to worry about your kid's entertainment being stolen from your locked hotel room! This ruined our entire trip!

Reviews.Title: “We had a wonderful stay. Would stay again.”
Reviews.Author: Sally63052
Reviews.Content: We've been to Branson many times. This time we chose Fall Creek Inn. The room was very clean and comfortable, the bathroom was spotless, and the staff was friendly. This inn is located just a little way from the Strip in a "rural" setting, close enough to be convenient, but far from the traffic congestion. It was nice to look out the window and see trees. Two restaurants are within walking distance. A little stream flows behind the property. This is a great family setting. The location is close to all the Branson shows as well as the Branson Bell, fish hatchery, and state park. You can take the back way to Silver Dollar City and avoid traffic. Discount show tickets are available here too. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable and quiet”
Reviews.Author: fborden
Reviews.Content: Stayed in their Jacuzzi suite for two nights very affordable, clean, friendly staff. We have stayed before and will return.

Reviews.Title: “Family trip -- great "hidden" gem off the strip!”
Reviews.Author: ArmyWIfey
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on a family trip to Branson with my parents. Great location: beautiful, off the strip yet still close to everything/easily accessible! Rooms were clean and quiet but there are no amenities other than soap ie hairdryers, shampoo etc so be sure to bring your own! Staff was wonderful and helpful with local (non paid tourist guide!) ideas on shows, restaurants,etc. Pool was closed when we got there due to cold weather the week before would have been great if it was indoors/enclosed! We ate at the Fall Creek restaurant next door which had awesome service (very fast) and tossed hot rolls!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay! Unique Location”
Reviews.Author: cassmaster8
Reviews.Content: We arrived at 2:30pm on Thursday; room was available right a way- we were in the Family suite- our room more than met our expectations! There was a king bed, which was very comfortable, a round table and chair, a comfy glider/rocker chair, tv, dresser, and 2 nite stands in the bigger area of the suite. Bathroom had a elevated jacuzzi tub/shower combo- lil girls loved the "hot tub." Living area had a sofa/sleeper, fridge, microwave and tv. (very nice setup) We are family of 5, (2 parents, teenager, and two under 10.) We got settled in and the 2 younger ones and the wife and I went straight to the pool. The pool was very clean, nice size and plenty deep. After a hour at pool, we went sight-seeing around the creek behind the hotel= very cool area back there! We pretty much "came and went" for the next three days and enjoyed the pool on a couple other occasions. Everyone we met from guests to front desk, to maids to the maintenance man who was watering the flowers outfront were friendly. We also bought a few souveniours(sp.) at the front desk and also bought some discounted tickets at the front desk. The owner was onsite everyday of our stay- he had introduced himself upon check-in and even helped out with our luggage to the room- I asked him about the Marine Corp flag(there was also a American flag) that was flying out front; he responded that he is still active in the reserves! I shook his hand and thanked him for his service. Breakfast was just as advertised; continental breakfast with 3 types of cereal, bagels, toast,muffins, milk, coffee, apple and orange juices, I believe also some type of fruits, and a good assortment of donuts. We were late risers one morning and they still had enough to accomodate us around 9am. Checkout was fast and easy and got a itemized statement detailing billing. Some PROS to this hotel: very friendly staff, clean-comfortable rooms, breakfast provided, nice pool, creek runs directly behind hotel, great nightly rates, hotel was completely full- but never once was disturbed by other patrons, front desk and owner extremely helpful with directions around branson to avoid the traffic jams, free wireless internet from your room. Some CONS to this hotel: I can honestly say that we never experienced any cons what-so-ever. Some attractions that we took part in during our stay: Ride the Ducks Table Rock, Ripleys believe it or not, Wax Museum, Tanger outlet malls(horrible traffic), Bransons Landing, WhiteWater waterpark, Fish Hatchery free tour below the damn, Moonshine Beach, Legends of Rock(michael jackson, alan jackson, little richard, elvis, etc) at the AMC. and last= the best day on Table Rock with one of my dear friends and his family boating and cliff jumping, jumping off rope swings, swimming etc...he really knows the meaning of the word PALS! We will definitely be making this a annual trip and we will stay no where else but Fall Creek Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Not the worst; not the greatest either.”
Reviews.Author: disneylover65
Reviews.Content: We were looking for an inexpensive and quick road trip and found this hotel on Expedia where we got three nights for the price of two which made it under $60/night. For the price, I guess it was okay. The room looked recently updated and seemed clean and the location is convenient to the Branson strip without being right on the strip. Traffic, however, was terrible on the weekend and it took us an hour to travel the short distance from our hotel to the strip the first morning (not the hotel's fault). Beds are the typical not-very-comfortable ones that come at this price range. Pillows seemed worn and somewhat lumpy. If you're just looking for a basic, cheap room, this will fit the bill. However, I wouldn't stay there again for the following reasons: First, there was ZERO hot water when we showered at 9am Sunday morning. The place was totally full on Saturday so I assume there just wasn't enough to keep up. Monday and Tuesday mornings were fine because there weren't as many hotel guests those days. Second, the continental breakfast is one of the worst I've experienced lately - a very limited variety of cheap donuts, generic cereal, bagels and canned fruit cocktail. Third, the pool which is outdoors (actually what we wanted in the hot, summer weather) is very tiny and only has 3 lounge chairs so don't plan on laying out and catching any rays. If we visit again, we will pay a little more to get a place that has a little more to offer.

Reviews.Title: “It is nice to be treated so special”
Reviews.Author: klmcmillan
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Fall Creek for the last 6 years. The hospitality of the staff is top notch. The location, service, cleanliness, value, and good continental breakfast keep us coming back. We will return in Oct. 2010. Kathy from Iowa

Reviews.Title: “Love Branson & Fall Creek Inn & Suites”
Reviews.Author: BOMC
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Fall Creek Inn and Suites and had just the best time. We had a great location that was close to Silver Dollar City, and White Water. The State Park Marina was just down the road and is a great place to launch the boat. The room was comfortable and cool for the hot July days and the Pool was cool and refreshing.

Reviews.Title: “Cross Country Break”
Reviews.Author: Graybird03
Reviews.Content: While planning our cross country trip from Atlanta to LA we decided to include a couple days layover in the Ozark/Branson area. A friend who had spent time in the area suggested the Fall Creek Inn to us as a nice affordable place to stay. He knew we were traveling on a tight budget and my wife is rather picky about the places we stay. Affordable and nice is often a hard combination to find but his tip was the best travel tip we got. The Fall Creek Inn staff was great Everyone always greeted us with a smile and were very helpful. I especially want to praise the young blonde there who's name I can't recall, but she made us feel like we were VIP's and just went out of her way to make our stay so very pleasant. I can not say enough nice things about her and I hope management is reading this and knows who we are referring to so that she receives the acknowledgment she deserves. The hotel itself felt like a family cabin in the woods. It was so relaxing and fun there that we altered our trip and skipped our stops in St. Louis and Kansas City to stay an extra two days just too relax and actually take a little vacation from our vacation. If you have ever done a family trip across country you know just how big a deal that is. Of all the places we went and amazing things we saw on that trip across this great country the whole family always still talks about what a great time we had in Branson and that was mostly due to everyone at the Fall Creek Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, courteous, clean.”
Reviews.Author: 1Deano1
Reviews.Content: My friends and I have stayed at Fall Creek Inn numerous times and never been disappointed. The staff is friendly and always ready to help. Next time I'm at Branson for a stay it will be at Fall Creek Inn.

Reviews.Title: “White Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: blakewhite23
Reviews.Content: I just go back from Branson with my family. We stayed 4 nights at Fall Creek Inn and the stay was very comfortable. It seemed a little bit that they were a bit understaffed but they did manage well. The beds were very comfortable and clean. The rooms did not have a microwave or refrigerator in the rooms but they were available to rent by the night. I loved the location, it is off by itself on highway 165 not too far from town but far enough out that it is peaceful. The motel does have a pool and the motel is set next to a little creek with picnic tables and barbeque grills. Next to the motel are two restaurants. One is a barbeque place and other is a good any kind of food place to eat. The only downside was that we were on the 3rd floor and we have two kids with us, one was an eight year old and the other was an 8 month old. It was a bit of a struggle to lug everything up those stairs but we did manage. i definitely recommend Fall Creek Inn to anybody but if you are traveling with kids i do suggest asking for ground floor.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Fourth Of July Weekend”
Reviews.Author: essy1971
Reviews.Content: Our family traveled from three different states to meet in Branson for a three night stay. We had 9 adults and 9 children traveling with our party. The Fall Creek Inn provided us with a wonderful stay. The grandparents had the wonderfully furnished suite, which allowed plenty of room for the grandchildren (a few of the kids enjoyed the jaccuzzi tub in the suite). The kids also enjoyed the swimming pool, while the adults took time to pitch several games of horseshoe's. We also recommend bringing a few fishing poles. With Fall Creek running behind the property, the kids can take some time and try their hands at catching and releasing a few fish.

Reviews.Title: “Fall Creek Inn is Spectacular”
Reviews.Author: Lance_Shelby
Reviews.Content: Great ambience Great value Great rooms Great times

Reviews.Title: “OUtstanding Service”
Reviews.Author: DapperDan1950
Reviews.Content: The Check in staff was excellent it only took a few minutes to check in and get our keys. The room was very clean and the air conditioner was on and was set at a very comfortable temperature. The room had plenty of towels and the Jacuzzi tub was great. It had two TV’s which was great since our grandchildren stayed with us and they could watch the TV shows they wanted. The pool was very clean and we enjoyed using it each day we were there. We also enjoyed using the horseshoe pit which is something you do not usually find at a hotel. The stream running along the back of the property added a soothing and relaxing atmosphere. The morning continental breakfast was set up every morning and there was a good assortment of food and beverages available. Even though the location is off the strip with the help of the hotel staff it was easy to get to the places we wanted to go. The hospitality of all the staff was great and we will recommend Fall Creek Inn & Suites to our friends and families

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for an overnight stay.”
Reviews.Author: MinnesotaRandy
Reviews.Content: The Fall Creek Inn is a basic hotel room with exterior corridors. Although the rooms are small, the hotel is great for a shorter stay. The beds were very comfortable. Our priorities when booking a room at the Fall Creek Inn were quality beds and a very clean room. I greatly appreciated the clean and well maintained rooms. The breakfast is basic but good. The staff is friendly. I was surprised however that the office closes at 11:00 pm even on the weekends. The location is very good in that is a bit off of the strip yet convenient. We appreciated the free Wi-fi.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Affordable”
Reviews.Author: lakc123
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel during a recent business trip. It was clean and comfortable. Staff was friendly. I don’t usually have time for breakfast their Continental breakfast was easy and satisfying. Free internet access came in very handy and allowed me to get a lot of work done from the room. Green space in the rear of the hotel that families and pets were taking advantage of. Great barbeque restaurant next door. Hotel is convenient to the strip without being on the strip. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have asked for a better place for our family group (with dogs!)”
Reviews.Author: dogdazed
Reviews.Content: The Fall Creek Inn was just perfect for our group of 10 people and 4 dogs. The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable. Even the rooms that allowed dogs were exceptionally clean and didn't smell like smoke or pets. The staff were very friendly and helpful, and they let us use the breakfast room until late at night so our family could get together and play games. There's a lovely creek behind the hotel, and a good-sized strip of grassy area along it to walk the dogs. I'm looking forward to going back in the summer sometime, to enjoy the picnic area and the pool. Oh, and the steak house next door was a fun place to eat, with very good food. I can't imagine we'll ever stay anywhere else in Branson now that we've found the Fall Creek Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Our group of 10 People and 4 dogs had a great stay at Fall Creek Inn and Suites!!!!”
Reviews.Author: RogerandPam
Reviews.Content: Our plans to go to Branson and Silver Dollar City took a turn for the worse when our pet sitter, who was going to take care of dogs for 4 families, didn't work out. I searched to find a place that took pets so we could take them with us. Luckily I found Fall Creek Inn and Suites. What a jewel! The room were very clean and didn't have any odor other than clean. They had a great place to walk your dogs in the back and they let us use the breakfast room until 11:30 at night to play cards. We highly recommend this place with or without pets!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: EricW7
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel out away from all the traffic and noise but still close to the strip

Reviews.Title: “Nice motel in rustic setting”
Reviews.Author: dklpapa
Reviews.Content: Room was clean and quiet. It is along one of the highways but felt secluded with hills, trees and the winding road. Traffic seemed to come to a stop at night. I believe they are closed in Jan and Feb and had recently re-opened when we were there. This was the non-peak season in Branson. We liked the somewhat rugged, rustic nature of the facility and the overall comfort and staff freindliness. Room prices are reasonable and overall a good value. There is a BBQ restaurant next door which was quite good. We didn't look for or see the swimming pool- not the season for that. Behind the motel is the Fall Creek and we were told there were picnic tables there but we didn't go there. There are a many shows, events, things to do and the motel staff was helpful with suggestions and directions and even offered to get discount tickets and make a reservation for us. Fish hatchery nearby was worth the visit- takes a few hours to go though it. Not far from the Table Rock Dam. There are charter fishing boats and the lake is huge. Butterfly Palace was pretty neat, too. Not all attractions shown for Branson are open all year. This in the Ozarks and the roads are winding and the area hilly, which adds to the allure. If first time visiting it is worth searching for the kinds of things you'd like to do in advance to help narrow the choices.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: TopDvlDog6
Reviews.Content: We had a great time in branson celebrating the Marine Corps Ball and the Fall Creek Inn was great. The staff people were excellent the room was clean, modern, very reasonable rates and the owner supported our Military. The owner is a Marine and Marine Corps flag flying out front made my heart thump with pride. I would recommend to anyone visiting Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Best stay in a long time!”
Reviews.Author: collegegirl12
Reviews.Content: This hotel was clean and very decently priced. The hotel staff was extremely helpful and nice, and made sure that our stay was as smooth and enjoyable as possible. The room was clean, and the hotel has decent amenities and breakfast for the price rate. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay in Branson, and the people that work there are so friendly!

Reviews.Title: “Good for the Price, Nice Grounds, but green pool”
Reviews.Author: Janet0619
Reviews.Content: Stayed Friday 7/31 and Saturday 8/1. We chose this hotel because we were coming to Branson to meet friends who were staying in a time share on the Fall Creek Resort up the street and we wanted to be close to them. This hotel is very basic, no frills, no free shampoo, no hair dryer etc but for the price it served its purpose and we were ok. The mattress was a bit hard but we slept well. We didn't eat the complimentary breakfast because we had other plans so I can't comment on that. The staff was nice, our room was clean and the grounds were well kept up. We stayed in the back facing the creek and it was pretty. We took a relaxing walk around the grounds at night. We didn't use the pool but from a distance it looked green so if you are planning to stay there I would check on that in advance if you want to swim. The location was nice, off the main strip. If you are looking for something basic, cheap and not planning to spend a lot of time in the room its good.

Reviews.Title: “will never stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: nellierdh
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at several different places around Branson, and this has definantly been the worst. We used three room for a large group of our family. One of the rooms smelled of heavy smoking. When we told them, they gave us a can of lysol to spray. We had called ahead to check if they had hair dryers, and they said they did but did not. The bathtubs appeared to have mildew on the floor and shower curtains. They ran out of breakfast, which only consisted of cereal, juice, and doughnuts, by 8:00-8:30 every morning. Some of our family only stayed for two nights, and they mixed up which family needed the room for three nights instead of two. Instead of just moving the next guests coming in to the other room that our family was leaving, they made the family staying switch to the other family's room. The hotel manager was rude and not very smart.

Reviews.Title: “Good & Clean But Never Again”
Reviews.Author: spikerchick17
Reviews.Content: I only booked two nights at this hotel because their website and all the travel sites portrayed it as a great place. They exclaimed on their site that they had a HUGE breakfast, HUGE pool, great rooms, etc. Well, that's not what they had at all. The breakfast consisted of 4 kinds of cereal, three kinds of juice, coffee and a plate of donuts. Nothing more. We also asked for a fridge and microwave in our room (extra $$ per day, per appliance) and they were both in our room upon arrival. We left our stuff in the room, went out for awhile, came back and the appliances were gone. We called downstairs and the lady brought them right back up. But still...why were they taken out in the first place? There were cigarettes everywhere on the property. Not sure if they were from guests or workers...but they were everywhere. The pool was really small and shoved back in the corner of the property. One good thing about the hotel is that they accept pets. We even saw a guy with a cat! We probably won't stay here again, but if it was the only thing available and we were really tired, I guess we'd give them our business. I just felt like the staff really didn't care if we were there or not. No one seemed thankful or appreciative. You can kind of feel the vibe of the hotel through the employees, so when they all act like zombies, something must be wrong.

Reviews.Title: “nice place for the money”
Reviews.Author: wildcat5415
Reviews.Content: nice motel for the money. away from all the congestion of branson. other reviews warned of the spiders, and yes, we did kill one spider while we were there for 2 nights, so kind of had a case of the "creepies" after that, but didnt see any more spiders or bugs. pretty clean. fridge didnt work but staff quickly brought another that did. was told on phone that room had a king bed and it didnt, and they didnt seem to know what i was talking about when i told them i booked a king room. we had a jacuzzi room, which was pretty small and cramped for the money but large enough for a couple. all in all, not a bad place, i would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “So So”
Reviews.Author: eaks
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel in the summer, the pool was open and ok. Room was ok as well. Figured it would be a quiet place being out of town. BUT I'm guessing with it so close to the lake there was a TON ok people with canoes. Also the great picnic tables were taken night and day by a bunch of rowdy people drinking. The pool area is fenced but drinkers were standing all around the fence being loud and rude. Would have been a good stay except for the MASSIVE group of people with no manners.

Reviews.Title: “They need help”
Reviews.Author: nancyrn
Reviews.Content: We found an add in the Hotel & Travel Coupons booklet and and area gas station. We have been in Branson many times and thought this time we would come without resevations. It was no problem finding a room. The coupon made it sound as if the microwave and fridge would be included in the room. It wasfor an extra fee. The internet did not come in, when I called and asked for help i was told it worked and to come down to use it in there lobby. The first morning we went down for breakfast at 8:50 am and the breakfast was already being put away and we felt as if we were imposing. The offer couple in there said that if you want breakfast you needed to be ther by 8:30, breakfast was to last until 9. Two offer couples came after us. That night when I asked for about the internet I was told if I came she would help me get in. This person was much more helpfull. The next night we came back from a long day and found the towels had been changed but the bed was not made nor was the garbage can emptied. When we checked out I verbalized my complaint once again and was told that the breakfast was out until 9 the first morning but when I reminded her of what was there and what she already had put away she had to agree with me. At that time a manager came out and listened to my complaint, she offered a free stay but tell me what good is that when we are from Wisconsin and have no clue when we will be back. Had they not charged my card they day after I registered they could have offered to reduce my bill by a day. I will not go back there

Reviews.Title: “Worth the price”
Reviews.Author: unwound
Reviews.Content: We recently spent several nights at the Fall Creek Inn. I selected the property based on reviews I read on TripAdvisor and was pleased when I actually saw the property . It was a clean, comfortable room at a reasonable price, just as I expected from the reviews. We had a lot of activities planned in and around Branson and since we weren't planning on spending a lot of time in our room we really didn't want to pay a lot for it. We just needed a place to sleep and bath. We paid less than $60 per night, including pet fees, on a holiday week so we were pleased. Our room was very clean and the beds were comfortable. These rooms have no frills at all but I give them high marks for their cleanliness. We had a pet friendly room that was clean with no bad odor. The rooms on either side of ours were occupied but we didn't hear any noise through the walls. They seemed well insulated for sound, but we could hear noise from the walkway outside through the door. Nothing that really bothered us though. The room keys are not swipe cards; they are actual keys. And the doors lock automatically when shut so be careful not to lock yourself out. The door had a deadbolt but not a chain or security latch from the inside, but we felt perpectly safe at the hotel. We were cautious about security after reading a review posted by a traveler who was a victim of theft while staying at the hotel. We were careful to make sure the door was locked when we left and didn't have any problems. There's a nice little picnic area in back of the hotel by the creek where you can grill out. The creek was high the day we checked in due to heavy rain and there was evidence that the parking lot may have flooded in a small area on the back side of the hotel right by the creek. The pool was a decent size and clean. The hotel provides pool towels. Several good restaurants are close to the property. We really liked that the hotel was off the main strip so traffic wasn't a problem, yet it was still quite close to everything. It was easy to find shortcuts from the hotel to our destinations to avoid most of the traffic congestion. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful. We were pleased with our stay at Fall Creek Inn and will stay there again if we go back to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, but no frig even though we had one reserved”
Reviews.Author: bellano
Reviews.Content: This place was nice and clean for the price. However, we had reserved a refrigerator a month in advance and we called the week before we arrived to see of they had one reserved for us and they said they did. When we showed up they "didn't have any". What is the point of reserving one if they don't have any. Staff was nice as most folks in Branson and we were gone all day and evening, only showing up to shower and sleep; so the place was adequate for us (other than promising us a frig and not having one.)

Reviews.Title: “Happy with Suites at Fall Creek”
Reviews.Author: zinger430
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the resort the first week of November. We were pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness of the rooms. My husband & I took my parents with us. The staff was so helpful in accommodating their needs. We went to a show in Branson and the staff provided a ride for my parents to attend one of the night's festivity at the resort. The only thing that was troublesome was the light outside my parents bedroom. There was a piece missing from the blinds on the glass and it shined in while they were sleeping. We put up a blanket and that solved the problem. Otherwise, it was a great stay. I've included some pictures that I took. We stayed in a 2 bedroom lock-off.

Reviews.Title: “Very disapointed”
Reviews.Author: Snickers10
Reviews.Content: We came with our clogging teams ready for a great time as we do every year at this.Pool was ready and so were our little girls.My friend took them to the pool and I went down to get pamplets to see what to do next.(tops we were gone 30 minutes)came back and our purses were stolen.Nothing else touched(cameras;etc)We had a bad time there, won't go there anymore.

Reviews.Title: “ Awful & Noisy”
Reviews.Author: butterflyrose101
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were supposed to stay here the 14th - 17th of June. It was a horrible hotel. They didn't bother to inform us that a dance team and a b-ball team were staying there. There were kids everywhere. Don't get me wrong we love kids. We have some. But, they were really, really noisy and were up all hours of the night. The walls at this hotel were paper thin. We paid $100/night to stay in a jacuzzi room. The suite was right next to the swimming pool on the ground floor. Who ever heard of such a thing. I repeatedly complained about the noise. The staff was very unhelpful. The only thing they did was say they were sorry. We checked out the morning of the last night. The staff said they were giving us $10 off per night that we said, but they lied because after I looked at the receipt and did the math... they did no such a thing. We are very, very unhappy with this hotel and we will never stay here again. I hope others look at this review and consider whether or not they should stay here. Oh yeah, one other thing this hotel definitely has bugs. I received several bug bites. Very unpleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Best place in Branson”
Reviews.Author: saustin3806
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I don't make much money but we wanted a place to spend memorial day weekend. we picked fall creek inn because it had such low rates so we were kinda afraid of what we might find, since alot of the reviews talk about getting bit by spiders!! But our room was CLEAN. Most definately the cleanest room I have EVER stayed in, and I travel quite a bit. The room was very small but it was exactly what we needed. The bed was really comfortable. The staff was really friendly and we didn't have any problems at all. If we ever go back to Branson we will definately be staying at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Unpleasant Stay ! Cleaning Problem's”
Reviews.Author: stanlillie
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Fall Creek Inn, for three days. No beding was changed for 3 days, the carpets were not ever vacuum,, The bath room sink had a dirty ring around the inside of it , The bath tub looked like it had not been cleaned for weeks.. -- Reported it to the office and (no one--no one )* * contacted us about our unpleasant stay .Extra charges for use of mirco wave and small refrigerator. THE GAGE FAMILY KANSAS CITY, MO

Reviews.Title: “Jacuzzi Suite”
Reviews.Author: kare19119
Reviews.Content: My husband and I didn't know what to expect upon arrival. We had a time working with the reservation agents w/ the hotel. They didn't seem to know rates, or dates. Luckily I was very prepared; I have worked in the travel industry and booked many a hotel room in my day. I booked our room months in advance, the evening I made the reservation about 11:00 pm we received a phone call wanting to know why we had not checked in. I explained to them the next morning I they had made a mistake we were not set to check in until 7/29/06. They apologized and guaranteed me the rate I had been quoted, after several calls to double check the reservation the manager finally had to assure the rate. Which the rate in my opinion was very high for what you get. The room was VERY clean, no complaints there. But it was very small, possibly the smallest room I have ever stayed in. When we first entered the room we were over whelmed with the smell of cigarette smoke. Even the extra bedding stunk of smoke. We quickly turned on the air and I didn't notice the smell much after that. The Jacuzzi was the very best part of the room; I would have been totally disappointed if it hadn't been for the Jacuzzi. It was very large, a 2 person if not larger, and like I said before everything was very clean. The Fall Creek Steakhouse was excellent. We had a short wait but it was totally worth it. Great food and atmosphere. Rudy, the roll tosser had a great time with the kids, and the rolls are wonderful. All in all our experience was average; I think that the nightly rates are a little high for what you get. IF YOU CALL TO MAKE YOUR RESERVATION please be sure to WRITE DOWN WHO YOU TALK TO. The hotel is away from the strip, neat back in the woods off the main highway...close to good food and attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Yikes! Spiders!”
Reviews.Author: gretchie
Reviews.Content: We saw what the other posters had said about getting spider bites, but we discounted them because the posts were from a while back. But my boyfriend was woken up at 3:00 AM by a painful bite that kept him up for a while. We stayed at the motel because they allow pets. Our "non-smoking" room still reeked of smoke. On the plus side, the grounds were well kept up, the room was very clean, and the front desk staff were friendly and efficient. Perfectly fine place to stay, but nothing special.

Reviews.Title: “Too pricy--mediocre service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We normally stay in a campground, but it was too cold this year so we booked a room here. We found a coupon for $39.99 a night, when we got there they wouldn't honor it unless we took a 3rd floor room. When I said "it doesn't state 3rd flr on the coupon" the desk clerk said "it doesn't state not 3rd flr either". Very rude!!! No elevator, and w/3 kids I was not staying on the 3rd floor. When I asked for more towels, she would only give me 2. They never washed our sheets the 4 nights we were there. The bathroom was clean, but the service was horrible!!! I won't stay here again--way too expensive for how we were treated!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and inexpensive”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed the Fall Creek Inn for four nights and I am very pleased with my decision to stay there. Check-in was fast and friendly and the room was small but very clean and well maintained. I understand they have larger "suite" type rooms also. The housekeepers did and excellent job each day. The cold continental breakfast was basic but good. This motel is located off of the main strip area so it is more quiet and less traffic. But it is still close to all of the restaurants and shows. It is also closer to Table Rock lake for boating and very close to upper Lake Taneycomo for trout fishing. There is a very nice steakhouse restaurant right next door on one side and a great little hamburger joint next door on the other side. I will certainly stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Not your best option for that price!”
Reviews.Author: AngiePete
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with our stay after reading the reviews. I can't believe we are talking about the same motel! No rooms were available with the discounted rate, so we had to pay $65. TOO MUCH! The location is not very great, and way too close to the highway. First, we were told when we arrived that they overbooked and we would have to be walked to a different hotel! Someone canceled and we got our room. The room was very small and NO extras at all. Just beds (NO BLANKET! just a sheet and bedspread), TV and table. There was no coffee pot, blow dryer, luggage rack, or even cups or soap. The towels were stained and ratty. The pool is very small, and the picnic area is just a gravel pad with 2 tables. Nothing like it is talked up to be. The creek was stagnant green water, but the weeds were so high you couldn't even see it. The ads I seen said high speed internet, but it failed to mention you have to PAY for it! It is $5 for 30 minutes. The staff was not friendly at all, almost to the point of being nasty. It concerns me they profess this to be a Christian run motel and they can't even respond to a "good morning!" : ( The breakfast was your very basic continental. We decided not to stay another night and was VERY impressed with Whispering Hills Motel the next night. It was cheaper, awesome breakfast and cobbler with ice cream in the evening and the staff was the friendlist ever. On the positive side, the room WAS very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great Inn...great location”
Reviews.Author: ddeano
Reviews.Content: Great little Motel. Room was small but looks brand new. Bed was very comfortable. Good cold Breakfast. I would stay again in Branson. Perfect motel for the Money.

Reviews.Title: “A Friendly, Clean, place to stay at a reasonable price....”
Reviews.Author: OkieDokieIII
Reviews.Content: This is a nice, friendly place to stay. Rooms were very clean...new towels, bedspreads, sheets, etc etc Rooms are adequate size but on the small side. Breakfast was in a nice room with adequate tables/chairs. There were several kinds of cereal, milk, juice, bagels, and an assortment of muffins and doughnuts. Not alot of choices, but it was adequate. My only complaint is that the hours for breakfast were 7-9am and many guests didn't make it down there in time. I think that's the point.....only half were eating breakfast there and held costs down. All in all, the location is great...out of that busy traffic of Hwy76.....nice size pool and lounge chairs. Also behind the place is a creek with a picnic area. Now, the creek is probably dry by this time of the year, but they had a grassed area and some picnic tables with several grills you can use. Several families with kids were cooking hot dogs, etc etc. All in all, it's not the Hilton, but we definately would stay there again. It's well above average for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing Location with a view”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The people are friendly and the rooms were clean. We enjoyed the view and location. The drive from the attractions was calming without alot of traffic. We plan on staying there again when in town.

Reviews.Title: “*** stars”
Reviews.Author: towerbug
Reviews.Content: ***start hotel. We've stayed here many times, never disappointed. The location is awesome for those who do not want to be stuck in the Branson traffic. Close to restaurants, entertainment, lake, river, easy back way to SDC. Continental bkfst, pet friendly, outdoor pool and bbq area. Not fancy by any means, but clean, friendly and inexpensive.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: joe454
Reviews.Content: We heard about this place thru some friends who loved it. We tried it and agree. There is a creek in the back with waterfalls and a picnic area. It has a large out door pool that my kids loved. The room we had was obviously remodeled recently. The staff there were bar none the friendliest in the business! We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay! Very clean, nice staff, adequate parking and a nice stream in the back. The swimming pool was very refreshing. They were able to make show reservations for a slightly lower price than advertised....and not a bug or spider in sight! We will be back!!!

HotelInfo.Name: Fall Creek Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 995 Highway 165, Branson, MO 65616
